data.lyric:
[ti:Good News]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Good News]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Good News - Mac Miller
[00:27.14]I spent the whole day in my head
[00:31.04]Do a little spring cleaning I'm always too busy dreaming
[00:37.17]Well maybe I should wake up instead
[00:41.85]A lot of things I regret but I just say I forget
[00:47.11]Why can't it just be easy
[00:50.20]Why does everybody need me to stay
[00:53.31]Oh I hate the feeling
[00:55.26]When you're high but you're underneath the ceiling
[00:57.77]Got the cards in my hand I hate dealing yeah
[01:05.76]Get everything I need then I'm gone but it ain't stealing
[01:09.82]Can I get a break
[01:11.82]I wish that I could just get out my god d**n way
[01:15.37]What is there to say
[01:17.34]There ain't a better time than today
[01:21.55]But maybe I'll lay down for a little yeah
[01:27.78]Instead of always trying to figure everything out
[01:33.08]And all I do is say sorry
[01:38.58]Half the time I don't even know what I'm saying it about
[01:44.04]Good news good news good news
[01:46.05]That's all they wanna hear
[01:49.82]No they don't like it when I'm down
[01:55.25]But when I'm flying oh
[01:57.25]It make 'em so uncomfortable
[01:59.86]So different what's the difference
[02:04.91]Well it ain't that bad
[02:07.63]It could always be worse
[02:10.65]I'm running out of gas hardly anything left
[02:14.55]Hope I make it home from work
[02:16.62]Well so tired of being so tired
[02:22.89]Why do I gotta build something beautiful just to go set it on fire
[02:28.86]I'm no liar but
[02:31.11]Sometimes the truth don't sound like the truth
[02:34.10]Maybe 'cause it ain't
[02:35.96]I just love the way it sound when I say it
[02:38.50]Yeah it's what I do
[02:41.25]If you know me it ain't anything new
[02:43.71]Wake up to the moon haven't seen the sun in a while
[02:46.80]But I heard that the skies still blue yeah
[02:50.43]I heard they don't talk about me too much no more
[02:56.26]And that's a problem with a closed door
[03:01.44]Good news good news good news
[03:03.30]That's all they wanna hear
[03:06.86]No they don't like it when I'm down
[03:12.43]But when I'm flying oh
[03:14.45]It make 'em so uncomfortable
[03:17.13]So different what's the difference
[03:22.46]There's a whole lot more for me waiting on the other side
[03:28.97]I'm always wondering if it feel like summer
[03:33.36]I know maybe I'm too late I could make it there some other time
[03:40.73]I'll finally discover
[03:44.13]That there's a whole lot more for me waiting
[03:49.61]That there's a whole lot more for me waiting
[03:55.51]I know maybe I'm too late I could make it there some other time
[04:02.32]Then I'll finally discover
[04:06.53]That it ain't that bad ain't so bad
[04:18.00]When it ain't that bad mm
[04:24.22]At least it don't gotta be no more
[04:29.63]No more no more no more no more
[04:35.15]No no no no no no no no
[04:39.87]Hey hey
[04:46.60]Mmm hey mmm mmm mmm
data.trans:
[ti:Good News]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Good News]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:27.14]我整日思绪万千
[00:31.04]我该做个春日大扫除 我总是忙着做白日梦
[00:37.17]也许我该幡然醒悟了
[00:41.85]我悔不当初 可嘴上说着我只是忘记了
[00:47.11]为何一切就不能轻松一点
[00:50.20]为何每个人都苦苦哀求我留下
[00:53.31]我讨厌这感觉
[00:55.26]当你醉生梦死的时候 可你还是身受束缚
[00:57.77]我有扭转乾坤的能力 可我置之不理
[01:05.76]把我需要的东西拿到手我就会离开 可这不是偷窃得到的
[01:09.82]我能否休息片刻
[01:11.82]我希望我可以调整好状态 畅通无阻
[01:15.37]我还有何话可说
[01:17.34]今天就是最佳时机
[01:21.55]也许我应该躺一会
[01:27.78]而不是竭尽全力把每件事都弄得一清二楚
[01:33.08]我能做只是说一句抱歉
[01:38.58]一半时候 我语无伦次 不知道我在说什么
[01:44.04]好消息 好消息 好消息
[01:46.05]便是他们渴望听到的
[01:49.82]他们不喜欢我意志消沉
[01:55.25]当我平步青云
[01:57.25]却让他们惶恐不安
[01:59.86]不太一样了 可又有何区别呢
[02:04.91]好吧 其实也没有那么糟
[02:07.63]总会有更惨的时候
[02:10.65]我已身心俱疲 什么都没剩下
[02:14.55]希望我下班就直接回家
[02:16.62]我对自己疲惫不堪的样子忍无可忍
[02:22.89]为何我亲手成就一番事业而只是将一切付之一炬
[02:28.86]我不说谎
[02:31.11]可有些时候 事实听上去假到令人发指
[02:34.10]也许我本身并非如此
[02:35.96]我只是喜欢我吐露心声时的感觉
[02:38.50]这是我的所作所为
[02:41.25]如果你了解我 那就不足为奇
[02:43.71]一觉醒来 月亮高悬 我已好久没有见过灿烂的阳光
[02:46.80]我听说蓝天依旧
[02:50.43]我听说他们再也不会对我议论纷纷
[02:56.26]这是一个无法破解的难题
[03:01.44]好消息 好消息 好消息
[03:03.30]便是他们渴望听到的
[03:06.86]他们不喜欢我意志消沉
[03:12.43]当我平步青云
[03:14.45]却让他们惶恐不安
[03:17.13]不太一样了 可又有何区别呢
[03:22.46]在另一边 还有许多东西正等着我
[03:28.97]我总是在想 那里是否如夏日一样
[03:33.36]我知道也许我为时已晚 我可以择日再去
[03:40.73]我终会发现
[03:44.13]还有许多东西正等着我
[03:49.61]还有许多东西正等着我
[03:55.51]我知道也许我为时已晚 我可以择日再去
[04:02.32]我终会发现
[04:06.53]也没有那么糟糕
[04:18.00]没有那么糟的时候
[04:24.22]至少不会觉得那么痛苦
[04:29.63]再也不会这样了
[04:35.15]//
[04:39.87]//
[04:46.60]//
